posts.text: title:我的JSP作业 用户注册注册信息表格页面1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768<body> <form action="Test1.jsp" method="post"> <center> <table border="1"> <tr> <td colspan="2">注册信息():</td> <tr> <td>用户名:</td> <td><input type="text" name="username"></td> </tr> <tr> <td>密码:</td> <td><input type="password" name="password"> </td> </tr> <tr> <tr> <td>密码确认:</td> <td><input type="password" name="password_confirm"> </td> </tr> <tr> <td>性别:</td> <td><input type="radio" name="sex" value="男">男 <input type="radio" name="sex" value="女">女 </td> </tr> <tr> <td>个人爱好:</td> <td> <input type="checkbox" name="interest" value="音乐">音乐 <input type="checkbox" name="interest" value="功夫">功夫 <input type="checkbox" name="interest" value="阅读">阅读 <input type="checkbox" name="interest" value="跑步" >跑步</td> </tr> <tr> <td>学历:</td> <td> <select name="select"> <option selected="selected">高中生</option> <option>专科</option> <option>本科</option> <option>研究生</option> <option>博士</option> </select><td></tr> <tr> <td>备注:</td> <td> <textarea name="textarea"> </textarea> <tr><td align="center" colspan="2"> <input type="submit" value="提交">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <input type="reset" value="重置"></td></tr> </table> </center> </form> </body> 接收登录信息页面12345678910111213141516171819202122232425<body> <%request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8"); String username=request.getParameter("username"); out.print("用户名："+username);%><br> <%String password=request.getParameter("password"); out.print("密码："+password);%><br> <%String password_confirm=request.getParameter("password_confirm"); out.print("确认密码："+password_confirm);%><br> <%String sex=request.getParameter("sex"); out.print("性别："+sex);%><br> <%String[] interest=request.getParameterValues("interest"); out.print("兴趣："); for(String i:interest) out.print(i+" "); %><br> <%String study=request.getParameter("select"); out.print("学历："+study);%><br> <%String comments=request.getParameter("textarea"); out.print("备注："+comments);%><br> <%if((password).equals(password_confirm)){ out.print("注册成功！");} else{ request.getRequestDispatcher("Error1.jsp").forward(request, response);}%> </body> 异常处理（密码确认）若确认密码输入一致则注册成功，否则提示密码错误注册失败 1234<body> 密码输入不一致!<br> 注册失败! </body> 运行效果图 整数除法整数除法界面12345678910<body> <form action="result.jsp" method="post"> <center> -------------------------------------整数除法 --------------------------------------------<br><br> 被除数：<input type="text" name="dividend">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 除数：<input type="text" name="divisor"><br><br> <input type="submit" value="计算"> </center> </form> </body> 整除操作，异常操作123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627<%@page errorPage="Error.jsp"%><body> <%int dividend; int divisor; int result; try{ String sdividend=request.getParameter("dividend"); dividend=Integer.parseInt(sdividend);}catch( NumberFormatException nfex ){ throw new NumberFormatException( "被除数不是整数! " );} try{ String sdivisor=request.getParameter("divisor"); divisor=Integer.parseInt(sdivisor);}catch( NumberFormatException nfex ){ throw new NumberFormatException( "除数不是整数! " ); } try{ String sdivisor=request.getParameter("divisor"); divisor=Integer.parseInt(sdivisor);}catch( ArithmeticException amex){ throw new ArithmeticException("除数不能为0! "); } result=dividend/divisor; out.print("被除数："+dividend+"<br>"); out.print("除数："+divisor+"<br>"); out.print("整除结果"+result); %> </body> 异常提示1234<%@page isErrorPage="true"%><body> <%=exception.toString()%> </body> 运行效果图 温馨提示根据时间动态提示相关语句1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829<body> <center> <table border="1" width="500"> <tr height="100"> <td align="center">温馨提示！</td> </tr> <tr height="100"> <td align="center">现在时间为：<%=time%></td> </tr> <tr height="100"> <td align="center"> <!-- 一下为嵌入到HTML中的Java代码，用来生成动态的内容 --> <% if (hour >= 24 && hour < 5) out.print("现在还是凌晨！时间还早，再睡会吧!"); else if (hour >= 5 && hour < 10) out.print("早上好！新的一天即将开始，你准备好了吗!"); else if (hour >= 10 && hour < 13) out.print("午安!"); else if (hour >= 13 && hour < 18) out.print("下午继续努力工作吧!"); else if (hour >= 18 && hour < 21) out.print("晚上好，自由时间!"); else if (hour >= 21 && hour < 24) out.print("已是深夜，注意休息!"); %> </table> </center></body> 运行效果图
title: this is my first blog 第一个博客Hello World！

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
